blocks.subject: RE: CAISO NOTICE:  Delay In Publishing Real Time Energy Notices
text: We should inform FERC Enforcement.  No formal filings.

blocks.to: Steffes, James D.; Shapiro, Richard; Dasovich, Jeff 	Comnes, Alan; Mara, Susan
blocks.sent: Monday, November 05, 2001 5:07 PM 	Monday, November 05, 2001 2:47 PM
blocks.subject: FW: CAISO NOTICE:  Delay In Publishing Real Time Energy Notices Importance:	High  This is so-o-o blatant.   -----Original Message----- 	FW: CAISO NOTICE:  Delay In Publishing Real Time Energy Notices Importance:	High
raw_header: To:	Steffes, James D.; Shapiro, Richard; Dasovich, Jeff
Subject:	FW: CAISO NOTICE:  Delay In Publishing Real Time Energy Notices
Subject:	FW: CAISO NOTICE:  Delay In Publishing Real Time Energy Notices
text: Normally I'd say this is unbelievable...but considering who sent it, I can't say I'm surprised...
Should we take this up with Bob Pease, or since it was inadequate to begin with, just forget it?

blocks.subject: CAISO NOTICE:  Delay In Publishing Real Time Energy Notices
raw_header: Subject:	CAISO NOTICE:  Delay In Publishing Real Time Energy Notices
text: Publication of Real Time Energy Information
Last Friday, the ISO informed you that effective today it would begin
publishing on OASIS additional information about real time energy purchases.
Based on concerns and issues raised by CERS and the State of California, the
ISO is delaying this publication.  We will provide you with additional
If you have questions or would like additional information, please contact
